Node.Text: Is that a fact. Another death and you believe it was a good evening?
Well something you have to look on the brightside of thing.
Only if you look on the negative side of thing.
What ever helps you sleep better at night now take me to floor 3. Please let us mourn that pathetic grounds keeper, oh what was his name?
If you say so commoner. Even though it's another dark days in this inn.
That is the Mr.Charles dying that way must have been painful.
Yes, death by snake bite sure does not kill fast or painless.
That's funny I wasn't aware that the police made the cause of death known to outside the force.
Well, you know sercets are not something well kept. But how did you know the cause of death?
I have some friends on the police force who sometimes keep me updated.
This hotel is having some dark days. You wouldn't happen to know anything about
Have you heard anything about it?
Just that the poor man died in the garden he kept. Foolish man.
You be safe out there, Ms. Virginia.
